verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨סֶף <WH3254> add ע֥וֹד <WH5750> again דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> Again David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּח֥וּר <WH970> young בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> [men] of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <WH6965> arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> with all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for מִֽבַּעֲלֵ֖י יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH1184> that [were] with him from Baale of Judah לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to bring up מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> from thence the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> is called שֵׁ֗ם <WH8034> whose name שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> by the name יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיַּרְכִּ֜בוּ <WH7392> And they set אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> about עֲגָלָ֣ה <WH5699> cart חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <WH2319> upon a new וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֔הוּ <WH5375> and brought מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> it out of the house אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <WH41> of Abinadab אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1389> the hill וְעֻזָּ֣א <WH5798> and Uzzah וְאַחְי֗וֹ <WH283> and Ahio בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> the sons אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <WH41> of Abinadab נֹהֲגִ֖ים <WH5090> drave אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲגָלָ֥ה <WH5699> cart חֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <WH2319> the new

וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֗הוּ <WH5375> And they brought מִבֵּ֤ית <WH1004> it out of the house אֲבִֽינָדָב֙ <WH41> of Abinadab אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1389> the hill עִ֖ם <WH5973> accompanying אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְאַחְי֕וֹ <WH283> and Ahio הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> went לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> the ark

וְדָוִ֣ד ׀ <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מְשַֽׂחֲקִים֙ <WH7832> played לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood בְרוֹשִׁ֑ים <WH1265> on all manner of [instruments made of] fir וּבְכִנֹּר֤וֹת <WH3658> even on harps וּבִנְבָלִים֙ <WH5035> and on psalteries וּבְתֻפִּ֔ים <WH8596> and on timbrels וּבִמְנַֽעַנְעִ֖ים <WH4517> and on cornets וּֽבְצֶלְצֶלִֽים׃ <WH6767> and on cymbals

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> And when they came עַד־ <WH5704> against גֹּ֣רֶן <WH1637> threshingfloor נָכ֑וֹן <WH5225> to Nachon's וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> put forth עֻזָּ֜א <WH5798> Uzzah אֶל־ <WH413> toward אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> [his hand] to the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God וַיֹּ֣אחֶז <WH270> and took hold בּ֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> nearly שָׁמְט֖וּ <WH8058> shook הַבָּקָֽר׃ <WH1241> of it for the oxen

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֤ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעֻזָּ֔ה <WH5798> against Uzzah וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <WH5221> smote שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God עַל־ <WH5921> for הַשַּׁ֑ל <WH7944> him there for [his] error וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> and there he died שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there עִ֖ם <WH5973> by אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> by the ark הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> was displeased לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after פָּרַ֧ץ <WH6555> had made יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> because the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <WH6556> a breach בְּעֻזָּ֑ה <WH5798> upon Uzzah וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> and he called לַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> the name of the place הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he פֶּ֣רֶץ עֻזָּ֔ה <WH6560> Perezuzzah עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> to this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיִּרָ֥א <WH3372> was afraid דָוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> and he וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵ֛יךְ <WH349> How יָב֥וֹא <WH935> come אֵלַ֖י <WH413> can אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> How shall the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָבָ֣ה <WH14> would דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> So David לְהָסִ֥יר <WH5493> not remove אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> into עִ֣יר <WH5892> unto him into the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיַּטֵּ֣הוּ <WH5186> carried it aside דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> but David בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱד֖וֹם <WH5654> of Obededom הַגִּתִּֽי׃ <WH1663> the Gittite

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <WH3427> continued אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> And the ark יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <WH5654> of Obededom הַגִּתִּ֖י <WH1663> the Gittite שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> months וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> Obededom וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> and all his household

וַיֻּגַּ֗ד <WH5046> And it was told לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִד֮ <WH1732> David לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying בֵּרַ֣ךְ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> the house עֹבֵ֤ד אֱדֹם֙ <WH5654> of Obededom וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> account אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> and all that [pertaineth] unto him because of the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> So David וַיַּעַל֩ <WH5927> and brought up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God מִבֵּ֨ית <WH1004> from the house עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <WH5654> of Obededom עִ֥יר <WH5892> into the city דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David בְּשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> with gladness

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּ֧י <WH3588> when צָעֲד֛וּ <WH6805> had gone נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <WH5375> And it was [so] that when they that bare אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> six צְעָדִ֑ים <WH6806> paces וַיִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> he sacrificed שׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> oxen וּמְרִֽיא׃ <WH4806> and fatlings

וְדָוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David מְכַרְכֵּ֥ר <WH3769> danced בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֹ֖ז <WH5797> with all [his] might לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְדָוִ֕ד <WH1732> and David חָג֖וּר <WH2296> [was] girded אֵפ֥וֹד <WH646> ephod בָּֽד׃ <WH906> with a linen

וְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> So David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מַעֲלִ֖ים <WH5927> brought up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּתְרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> with shouting וּבְק֥וֹל <WH6963> and with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> of the trumpet

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> happened אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> And as the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֖א <WH935> came עִ֣יר <WH5892> into the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וּמִיכַ֨ל <WH4324> Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> Saul's נִשְׁקְפָ֣ה ׀ <WH8259> looked בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> out הַחַלּ֗וֹן <WH2474> through a window וַתֵּ֨רֶא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David מְפַזֵּ֤ז <WH6339> leaping וּמְכַרְכֵּר֙ <WH3769> and dancing לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַתִּ֥בֶז <WH959> and she despised ל֖וֹ בְּלִבָּֽהּ׃ <WH3820> him in her heart

וַיָּבִ֜אוּ <WH935> And they brought אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> in the ark יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּצִּ֤גוּ <WH3322> and set אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בִּמְקוֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> it in his place בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָטָה־ <WH5186> had pitched ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> that David וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> offered דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> for it and David עֹל֛וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> and peace offerings

וַיְכַ֣ל <WH3615> had made an end דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And as soon as David מֵהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> of offering הָעוֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> burnt offerings וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> and peace offerings וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> he blessed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people בְּשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וַיְחַלֵּ֨ק <WH2505> And he dealt לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> among all the people לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> [even] among the whole multitude יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לְמֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> as men וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁה֒ <WH802> as well to the women לְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> to every one חַלַּ֥ת <WH2471> cake לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> of bread אַחַ֔ת <WH259> a וְאֶשְׁפָּ֣ר <WH829> and a good piece אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and one וַאֲשִׁישָׁ֖ה <WH809> [of flesh] and a flagon אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> and one וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> departed כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> [of wine] So all the people אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> to his house

וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> returned דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> Then David לְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> to bless אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> his household וַתֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> came out מִיכַ֤ל <WH4324> And Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> of Saul לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> to meet דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said מַה־ <WH4100> How נִּכְבַּ֨ד <WH3513> How glorious הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> to day מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> was the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he נִגְלָ֤ה <WH1540> who uncovered הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> himself to day לְעֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> in the eyes אַמְה֣וֹת <WH519> of the handmaids עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants כְּהִגָּל֥וֹת <WH1540> shamelessly נִגְל֖וֹת <WH1540> uncovereth אַחַ֥ד <WH259> as one הָרֵקִֽים׃ <WH7386> of the vain fellows

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֮ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to מִיכַל֒ <WH4324> unto Michal לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> [It was] before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who בָּֽחַר־ <WH977> which chose בִּ֤י מֵֽאָבִיךְ֙ <WH1> me before thy father וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> and before all his house לְצַוֹּ֨ת <WH6680> to appoint אֹתִ֥י <WH853> נָגִ֛יד <WH5057> me ruler עַל־ <WH5921> over עַ֥ם <WH5971> over the people יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וְשִׂחַקְתִּ֖י <WH7832> therefore will I play לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וּנְקַלֹּ֤תִי <WH7043> And I will yet be more vile עוֹד֙ <WH5750> will be more מִזֹּ֔את <WH2063> than thus וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become שָׁפָ֖ל <WH8217> and will be base בְּעֵינָ֑י <WH5869> in mine own sight וְעִם־ <WH5973> with הָֽאֲמָהוֹת֙ <WH519> and of the maidservants אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom אָמַ֔רְתְּ <WH559> which thou hast spoken עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> with אִכָּבֵֽדָה׃ <WH3513> of of them shall I be had in honour

וּלְמִיכַל֙ <WH4324> Therefore Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had לָ֖הּ יָ֑לֶד <WH3206> child עַ֖ד <WH5704> against י֥וֹם <WH3117> unto the day מוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH4194> of her death פ
